title: Securing the Model Context Protocol: Defending LLMs Against Tool Poisoning and Adversarial Attacks
summary: The Model Context Protocol (MCP) enables Large Language Models to integrate external tools through structured descriptors, increasing autonomy in decision-making, task execution, and multi-agent workflows.
